string-array.name: meal01_details
string-array.item: This meal starts your day by giving you foods that allow your body to have energy for your morning tasks and or exercise.

string-array.name: meal02_details
string-array.item: This light snack allows gives your body the fuel to continue to burn calories at a steady pace.

string-array.name: meal03_details
string-array.item: This is generally your mid-day meal and should include both carbohydrates and protein.

string-array.name: meal04_details
string-array.item: This light mid afternoon snack provides your body with a steady stream of nutrition to help keep your metabolism high.

string-array.name: meal05_details
string-array.item: This is the last relatively large meal of the day. It provides your body with the nutrients you will need to build and maintain muscle as well as keep your metabolism high.

string-array.name: meal06_details
string-array.item: This last light snack of the day should be considered optional. Depending on your health and fitness goals, this may provide some necessary calories and nutrients for your body.
